name: Spearow
flavorText:
It flaps its small wings busily to
fly. Using its beak, it searches
in grass for prey.

previous.name: Raticate
previous.flavorText:
It uses its whis­
kers to maintain
its balance. It apparently
slows down if
they are cut off.

next.name: Fearow
next.flavorText:
With its huge and
magnificent wings,
it can keep aloft without ever
having to land
for rest.
